message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to offer it to you for $6000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $4500. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to get a good deal.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm still a bit above your budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $5200.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $4800, but that's as high as I can go.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer it to you for $5000, which is the lowest price I'm willing to accept.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $4800, but I'm not willing to go any higher. Can you meet me at $4800?
I understand that you're still a bit above your budget, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway again. I'll offer it to you for $4900, which is the closest I can get to your desired price.
I'm really close to my budget, but I'm still a bit above. I'm willing to go up to $4800, but I'm not willing to go any higher. Can you meet me at $4800?
